snippet: The Menier Chocolate Factory’s revival of the show, starring Sheridan Smith, will run at the Savoy Theater starting April 9.
abstract: The Menier Chocolate Factory’s revival of the show, starring Sheridan Smith, will run at the Savoy Theater starting April 9.

headline.print_headline: ‘Funny Girl’ Lands West End Before Opening
headline.main: ‘Funny Girl’ Secures Transfer to West End, Before It Even Opens
